casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Thomas Craig Campbell No. 252PA14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Campbell, Thomas Craig. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The State's Petition for Discretionary Review is allowed only as to whether the Court of Appeals erred in invoking Rule 2 of the North Carolina Rules of Appellate Procedure under the circumstances of this case. The State's Petition for Discretionary Review is otherwise denied.

By order of the Court in Conference, this 9th day of June , 2016.
